p: Soma Cap is building a multi stage seed to late stage venture platform focused on B2B / SaaS across multiple sectors and geographies. We've been early investors in hundreds of startups including 25 unicorns since launching 7 years ago. Work closely next to founding partner Aneel Ranadive developing "mastery of the Soma portfolio." Get to know our legendary breakout founding teams seed to late stage, and build our software database tracking our founders and network connections to make unlocking the value of our network self service for our founders. Capture portfolio data for the Soma team internally, and to continually raise the bar in how we make investments with data, automate helping founders w/ customer intro's and insights, and accelerate the Soma team's intelligence around trends and pattern recognition. We aim to build "software for VC" to continually raise the bar in how we make investments and improve getting the right resource to the right founders at the right times.
p.2: Here is an overview of our portfolio bit.ly/somacompanies
p.4: Build the founder, and investor network of a lifetime, learn the ins and outs of incredible technology teams across multiple sectors and geo's, and build software for VC to scale the Soma platform to hundreds more seed investments and follow on investments. We aim to grow from seeding 25 unicorns to hundreds in the coming years, and increase our helpfulness as product market fit is achieved by top breakout teams.

li: Develop quality software and web applications
li.1: Analyze and maintain existing software applications

li: Bachelor's degree or equivalent experience in Computer Science or related field
li.2: SQL database or relational database skills
